title: Workcover: a comprehensive video guide
creator_credit: Kingwest Productions, Video Master, Dieter Vornhagen and Steven King
brief_description: Andrew Ellis, solicitor, discusses the individual’s rights to compensation for work related injuries. Topics include: the role of the solicitor; making a claim for compensation; lump sums for permanent disability; the role of the courts and dispute settlement. This program is intended as a starting point, not as a replacement for expert legal advice.
